titleStmt.title: The yellow book, or, A serious letter sent by a private Christian to the Lady Consideration, the first day of May, 1659 which she is desired to communicate in Hide-Park to the gallants of the times a little after sun-set : also a brief account of the names of some vain persons that intend to be there, whose company the new ladies are desired to forbear.
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

titleStmt.title: The yellow book, or, A serious letter sent by a private Christian to the Lady Consideration, the first day of May, 1659 which she is desired to communicate in Hide-Park to the gallants of the times a little after sun-set : also a brief account of the names of some vain persons that intend to be there, whose company the new ladies are desired to forbear.
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Tho. Butler and by Tho. Brewster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
